backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing added static images on the landing page and affected components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, loading fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering SEO configuration, landing page, and toast notifications.
Application form with validation, state handling, and email/WhatsApp submission helpers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying links, contact info, and partner platforms with responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: Runtime SEO component setting title, meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter cards, and JSONâ€‘LD.
frontend/src/components/StickyHeader.tsx: Sticky header with scroll detection, smooth navigation, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/content/contactAndLinks.ts: Exports structured contact info, external URLs, and social labels for use across the site.
frontend/src/content/landingCopy.ts: Provides all static text and structured copy for the landing page, including hero, overview, platform details, and candidate criteria.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom light/dark theme using CSS variables for the site's design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the full marketing landing page using content modules, UI components, sections, and application flow triggers.
frontend/src/utils/buildDraftLinks.ts: Generates mailto and WhatsApp links prefilled with application data for submitting user information.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and keyframes, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements for building an SEO-friendly marketing website with specified sections, assets, links, and an application form.
